remarks: A lemma for eliminating inequality, in inference form.  (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 31-May-2019.)
statement:
sbceq1ddi.1 $e |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
sbceq1ddi.2 $e |- ( ps -> th ) $.
sbceq1ddi.3 $e |- ( [. A / x ]. ch <-> th ) $.
sbceq1ddi.4 $e |- ( [. B / x ]. ch <-> et ) $.
sbceq1ddi $p |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> et ) $.
